content.rendered:
Welcome to Saratoga Springs High School!  Whether you are a new or returning student, we are excited to have you here with us. Saratoga Springs High School has a tradition of excellence in all areas. At our high school, we encourage students to take full advantage of the extensive learning opportunities that are offered. Through our courses and wide range of co-curricular activities, the administration, faculty, and staff fully expect that our students will develop their abilities, exhibit responsibility, and value learning. 

Attendance

Regular and on-time attendance at school is a critical factor in supporting student achievement and success. Parents are required to provide an excuse within a two-week period of the absence (ten school days), indicating the reasons for any absence, tardiness, or early departure from school.

To report an absence or late arrival, please email highschool_attendance@saratogaschools.org or call the attendance office.

If an absence is not reported prior to 10:30 a.m., parents/guardians will receive an attendance message through ParentSquare notifying them of their student’s absence. Parents/guardians will be able to respond to the message through ParentSquare with a digital note to excuse their child’s absence.

School Schedule

M,T,T,F: 7:49 a.m. -2:20 p.m. | W: 7:49 a.m. -2:05 p.m

View the SSHS Bell Schedule

Tech Support Form

High School Student ID Replacement 

All students are issued a student ID free of charge at the beginning of every school year.  Student IDs are required to ride a school bus and purchase items in the cafeteria.  If a child loses their student ID, a replacement can be ordered through MySchoolBucks.com. The cost of a replacement student ID is $5.00. The cost of a replacement ID for a student who is eligible to receive free or reduced-price meals is $1.00. 

 Directions: 

  1. Go to myschoolbucks.com and click Sign-Up
  2. Visit the District’s School Store and add “High School Student ID” to your cart 
  3. Checkout with your credit/debit card
  4. The student ID will be printed and available in the main office for pick-up

Saratoga Springs High School Committees

Building Equity Leadership Team (BELT)

Facilitator: Ms. Johanna Friedman

Invited Participants: Staff, students and parents

Committee Purpose: BELT is a shared decision making committee that discusses, reviews, and makes changes to a variety of issues that impact our school learning environment.

Meeting Dates and Times: All meetings are held in A109 from 2:30pm – 3:30pm.  

Building Emergency Response Team (BERT)

Facilitator: Ms. Erin Bennett

Invited Participants: Staff, students and parents

Committee Purpose: BERT discusses and reviews safety recommendations and procedures for the high school. BERT supports the initiatives of the District Emergency Response Team (DERT).

Meeting Dates and Times: Meetings are held in A109 from 2:30pm-3:10pm.

Leadership Advisory

Facilitator: Ms. Michelle Tsao

Invited Participants: Staff only

Committee Purpose: Leadership Advisory is for staff to provide input and feedback to the HSLT (HS Leadership Team). This committee works to improve culture and climate amongst the staff.

Meeting Dates and Times: Meetings are held in A109 from 2:30pm-3:10pm. 

Time and Space

Facilitator: Ms. Michelle Tsao

Invited Participants: Staff, students and parents

Committee Purpose: Time and Space is a committee that provides input to the administration relating to decisions on the bell schedule and building improvements, such as our learning spaces with the Legacy Plan.

Meeting Dates and Times: Meetings are held in A109 from 2:30pm-3:30pm.
